      public void printOrders​(java.util.List<datamodel.Order> orders, boolean printVAT)
      Description copied from interface: system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Print orders to System.out in format (example): #5234968294, Eric's Bestellung: 1x Kanne 20,00 EUR #8592356245, Eric's Bestellung: 4x Teller, 8x Becher, 4x Tassen 49,84 EUR #3563561357, Anne's Bestellung: 1x Kanne aus Porzellan 20,00 EUR #6135735635, Nadine Ulla's Bestellung: 12x Teller blau/weiss Ker.. 77,88 EUR #4835735356, Timo's Bestellung: 1x Kaffeemaschine, 6x Tasse 47,93 EUR #6399437335, Sandra's Bestellung: 1x Teekocher, 4x Becher, 4x Te.. 51,91 EUR ------------- ------------- ------------- Gesamtwert aller Bestellungen: 267,56 EUR |<--------------------------------------------------------->|
      Specified by:
      printOrders in interface system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Parameters:
      orders - list of orders to print
      printVAT - print included VAT at the end of each line item

    • fmtPrice

      public java.lang.String fmtPrice​(long price, java.lang.String currency)
      Description copied from interface: system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Format long-price in 1/100 (cents) to String using DecimalFormatter, add currency and pad to minimum width right-aligned. For example, 299, "EUR", 12 -> " 2,99 EUR"
      Specified by:
      fmtPrice in interface system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Parameters:
      price - price as long in 1/100 (cents)
      currency - currency as String, e.g. "EUR"
      Returns:
      price as String with currency and padded to minimum width

    • fmtPrice

      public java.lang.String fmtPrice​(long price, java.lang.String currency, int width)
      Description copied from interface: system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Format long-price in 1/100 (cents) to String using DecimalFormatter, add currency and pad to minimum width right-aligned. For example, 299, "EUR", 12 -> " 2,99 EUR"
      Specified by:
      fmtPrice in interface system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Parameters:
      price - price as long in 1/100 (cents)
      currency - currency as String, e.g. "EUR"
      width - minimum width to which result is padded
      Returns:
      price as String with currency and padded to minimum width

      Description copied from interface: system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Format line to a left-aligned part followed by a right-aligned part padded to a minimum width. For example: <> "#5234968294, Eric's Bestellung: 1x Kanne 20,00 EUR (3,19 MwSt)" |<---------------------------------------------------------------->|
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      leftStr - left-aligned String
      rightStr - right-aligned String
      width - minimum width to which result is padded
      Returns:

    • singleName

      public java.lang.String singleName​(datamodel.Customer customer)
      Description copied from interface: system.Components.OutputProcessor
      Returns single-String name obtained from first- and lastName attributes of Customer object, e.g. "Eric", "Meyer" returns single-String "Meyer, Eric".

      Returns:
